HEA_composition.element_groups: group IV to XV elements (early d-block to p-block)

synthesis.reactor_type: benchtop 4-way flow reactor with sequential injection
synthesis.injection_strategy: sequential injection from slower to faster reduction groups
synthesis.post_synthesis: mixing with carbon dispersion at reactor outlet

STEM_EDX.mapping: all 15 elements detected in individual nanoparticles

XRD.feature: very weak and broad diffraction peaks

PDF_analysis.structure: metallic amorphous-like structure with short-range order

activity.cyclic_voltammetry: higher current density than 5-MEA, 10-MEA, Pt, and Pd for all AORs
activity.trend: maximum current density increases with carbon number from ethanol to butanol

selectivity_and_completeness.interpretation: enhanced complete oxidation and high CO poisoning tolerance

chronoamperometry.finding: current density maintained for 15-UMEA, while Pd decays to near zero

reaction_promotion: enhanced OH− adsorption at low potential
mechanistic_insights.structure_property_relation: ultra-multielement interactions enable multistep complete alcohol oxidation
